{% style %} .features-row { padding: 4rem 0; } .features-row__content { display: grid; grid-template-columns: repeat(auto-fit, minmax(280px, 1fr)); gap: 3rem; align-items: start; } @media screen and (min-width: 750px) { .features-row__content { gap: 4rem; } } @media screen and (min-width: 990px) { .features-row { padding: 6rem 0; } .features-row__content { gap: 5rem; } } .feature-item { text-align: center; display: flex; flex-direction: column; align-items: center; height: 100%; padding: 2rem 1rem; } .feature-item__icon { width: 6rem; height: 6rem; display: flex; align-items: center; justify-content: center; margin-bottom: 2rem; border-radius: 50%; background-color: rgba(var(--color-foreground), 0.05); transition: transform var(--duration-short) ease; } .feature-item__icon svg { width: 3rem; height: 3rem; fill: rgb(var(--color-foreground)); } .feature-item:hover .feature-item__icon { transform: translateY(-0.2rem); } .feature-item__title { font-size: calc(var(--font-heading-scale) * 1.6rem); font-weight: var(--font-heading-weight); font-family: var(--font-heading-family); color: rgb(var(--color-foreground)); margin: 0 0 1rem 0; line-height: 1.3; } .feature-item__description { font-size: 1.4rem; line-height: 1.5; color: rgba(var(--color-foreground), 0.7); margin: 0; max-width: 280px; } @media screen and (min-width: 750px) { .feature-item__icon { width: 7rem; height: 7rem; margin-bottom: 2.5rem; } .feature-item__icon svg { width: 3.5rem; height: 3.5rem; } .feature-item__title { font-size: calc(var(--font-heading-scale) * 1.8rem); margin-bottom: 1.5rem; } .feature-item__description { font-size: 1.5rem; } } /* Icon styles for different types */ .feature-item__icon--accent-1 { background-color: rgba(var(--color-base-accent-1), 0.1); } .feature-item__icon--accent-1 svg { fill: rgb(var(--color-base-accent-1)); } .feature-item__icon--accent-2 { background-color: rgba(var(--color-base-accent-2), 0.1); } .feature-item__icon--accent-2 svg { fill: rgb(var(--color-base-accent-2)); } {% endstyle %}
{% for block in section.blocks %}
{% case block.settings.icon %} {% when 'shipping' %} {% when 'guarantee' %} {% when 'support' %} {% when 'quality' %} {% when 'returns' %} {% when 'security' %} {% else %} {% endcase %}
{% if block.settings.title != blank %}

{{ block.settings.title | escape }}

{% endif %} {% if block.settings.description != blank %}

{{ block.settings.description | escape }}

{% endif %}
{% endfor %}
